name: v1.0.9
body:
## Changes
- Add support for hooks run before or after most build steps and commands
- Add a version command (this is definitely overdue)
- Add vs-code config by default, so builds can be done automatically.
- Add support for downloading and unzipping extra dependencies into the tools folder
- Don't break things when a directory needs to be created recursively

## Commits
- 83a4e6e: Automated documentation push for release v1.0.8 (cppchriscpp)
- e9cae54: Add pre/post command abilities, vscode config, version command (cppchriscpp)
- e2d4fcf: Try to make build less whiny (cppchriscpp)
- f6a7acb: Automated documentation push (cppchriscpp)
- 1b70527: Automated documentation push (cppchriscpp)
- b1c4992: Maybe fix the release notes automation (cppchriscpp)
- c1d8a1f: Meh, manual site updates to avoid redoing that release (cppchriscpp)
- c9c93fa: Replace readme with latest too (cppchriscpp)
- 8a0e54f: Automated documentation push (cppchriscpp)
- da0fd13: Bad logging causes errors (cppchriscpp)

body:
## Changes
- Allow the use of --compiler-options --linker-options and --assembler-options to pass arguments down to the underlying programs

## Commits

name: v1.0.5
body:
## Changes
- Mapper methods should actually work now; there was a minor mistake with exports that would result in unresolve externals

## Commits
- 0a9b433: Automated documentation push for release v1.0.4 (cppchriscpp)
- a1ab645: Automated documentation push (cppchriscpp)
- Actually export the mapper methods ([cppchriscpp](https://github.com/cppchriscpp/create-nes-game/commit/45246bf0afada9198e9a8e3bbfc57ce9b8114406))

name: v1.0.4
body:
## Changes
- Fixed a bug that caused create-nes-game to get add to PATH with every install
- Allow recursive file structures in C projects

## Commits
- f275e47: Automated documentation push for release v1.0.3 (cppchriscpp)
- 1590af8: Automated documentation push (cppchriscpp)
- 92b2828: Credit JamesSheppardd (cppchriscpp)
- 48e9c4e: Fix a bug where installing on windows will add to the path more than once (cppchriscpp)
- 0c9ea4f: Allow recursive definition, and re-add the reset method neslib exposes (cppchriscpp)

name: v1.0.3
body:
## Changes
- Add support for starting from nerdy nights tutorials 

## Commits
- 34612ee: Automated documentation push for release v1.0.2 (cppchriscpp)
- 0228411: Automated documentation push (cppchriscpp)
- 1568889: Fix documentation around nsf2data and text2data, I no longer bundle binaries since they vary (cppchriscpp)
- 5f76a9c: Allow creating nerdy nights tutorials automatically (cppchriscpp)
- fad983e: Update readme (cppchriscpp)
